attributes.action: STOP taking income tax off us until you stop using it to fund criminal activity.
attributes.additional_details: On a daily basis we hear of more and more politically motivated criminal activity by high level recipients of a taxpayer funded salary, the most recent being the blatantly illegal detention of a Brazilian citizen at Heathrow Airport under obviously pretence charges of terrorism.  It is wrong that our politicians continue to use our income taxes to fund their politically motivated criminal activity by using our money to pay the fines and compensation orders arising out of their criminality.  People have been executed for less in our recent history, all we do nowadays is agree and let them take more from us in taxes.  This gross criminalisation of the population by association, MUST STOP.
